analysis: The project appears to be a website about black holes with a focus on UI and animations. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website, as well as GitHub and documentation pages. The theme should be dark and cosmic, with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The existing to-dos indicate that the CSS and JavaScript files need to be completed to achieve the intended theme and functionality.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
